name: Pintman:Escape the Lockdown
description: The pubs have closed, the kegs have run dry and the people are in despair. Guide Pintman on his journey , as he avoids monsters, the gards and a bit of d'aul covid as he searches for the fabled bottomless pint so that the pubs can be reopened, the pints will flow freely again and lockdown can be ended once and for all.
